contents:
太搞笑了，在很多年前一直反复重申“主权高于一切”的国家，要不是面对西方国家的压力，可能至今甚至都还没...

垃圾五毛死光光

admin 你个垃圾有核武器了?

共匪有, 以色列有, 就你没有, 然后我就变成高级五毛了? 你才是五毛吧, 否认事实一败涂地被打出大陆, 还不看事实. 快来举报吧, 你个垃圾五毛死全家.

这还不知道, 你们都看过任何历史么, 原因只有一个, 因为台湾只是美国的一个妓女, 共匪鞑党很了解这个.

苏联给了共匪鞑党核武器, 美国佬给了台湾么? 美国给了以色列核武器, 美国佬给了台湾么? 台湾就是美国佬的一个妓女, 根本没有任何公平可言.

Soviet gave tartare communists nuclear weapon, and Soviet helped building tartare communists' big military industry, but Nazi America did not allow its good dog Taiwan (freedom China) to have nuclear weapon in old days, and Nazi America did not allow its good dog to have military industry, while Israel is a bad dog of Nazi America, and Nazi America allows its bad dog to have nuclear weapon, and Nazi America allows its bad dog to have military industry.

It's completely unfair .

Does tartare communists who killed one billion infants support freedom and free speech ?

If you are a typical chinese, you can only have one child, and the rest of your infants must be killed under the order of tartare communists. But if you are a tartare, you can have two and more children, admitted by the tartare communists ! All hail tartare communists !

Do you really believe poor china decades ago had enough qualified drugs to kill infants in birth control ? Do you really believe tartare communists would always nicely and politely give you drugs to kill your infants ?

Why do freedom countries not care about the biggest Racial discrimination and the biggest Genocide of the world ?

汉人只能生一个, 鞑子可以生好几个, 好大的同胞阿, 鞑子中国快点亡 , 鞑子共匪屠杀了十亿汉人, 数量上看是人类有史以来最大的汉奸.
共匪建国以来, 汉族人口增加了远不足两倍, 而维吾尔族人口增加了四倍, 好笑么, 宏观人口统计数据很好笑是吧.
即使中华民国这个弱鸡也不可能干出, 汉人生一个, 鞑虏生几个
